description: This file defines a class named ZigbeePanIdAttack that extends the Event class. It represents a specific type of event related to a Zigbee PAN ID attack within a mock Zigbee core event framework.

classes.name: ZigbeePanIdAttack
classes.description: A class representing a Zigbee PAN ID attack event, inheriting from the Event base class.

methods.name: ZigbeePanIdAttack
methods.description: Constructor initializing the ZigbeePanIdAttack event with the string 'panIdAttack'.
